EDUCATION.Institute Name: Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines), Dhanbad

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Handwritten digit recognition using ANN from scratch
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Implemented a handwritten digit recognition system using a three layered artificial neural network from scratch in python with squared error loss function. The system was trained on the MNIST dataset. Accuracy of the system was measured to be 95%.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: handwritten digit recognition  using CNN from scratch
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Implemented a five layered handwritten digit recognition system using convolutional neural network with numpy as the only dependency in python. The images used for the process are from the MNIST dataset.

Implemented a three layered artificial neural network with binary cross entropy loss function to predict which customers are likely to leave the bank service. Accuracy was measured to be 96%. Dataset : Banking Dataset

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Binary classification of images using CNN  in  keras
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Implemented a six layered convolutional neural network to recognize a given image of cat or dog using keras. Binary cross entropy loss function was used for the process.
